entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 7 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 2:19 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Flurries ending after midnight then cloudy. Local blowing snow this evening and after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 2:19 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
